prod_short_desc: Save the super hero café from the evil Kryptomites!
prod_long_desc:
Join in the action-packed LEGO® DC Super Hero Girls™ world as Harley Quinn™ battles the mischievous green Kryptomites at the Capes and Cowls Café. This great set features Harley Quinn™ and Steve Trevor™ mini-doll figures, a two-level café building with a cupcake catapult and rotating arcade machine, plus Harley Quinn’s jet with movable wings, a net shooter, and two mischievous green Kryptomites.
Build the Harley Quinn’s jet with movable wings, and the two-level café featuring a cupcake catapult and rotating arcade machine!
Featuring settings and characters from DC Super Hero Girls animated show
Includes Harley Quinn and Steve Trevor mini-doll figures, plus 2 green Kryptomites
LEGO DC Super Hero Girls building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Café measures over 5”, 4” wide and 2” long. Harley’s jet measures over 1” high, 2” long and 4” wide.
217 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 12
